title: New Icons
body: So I have seen people with this Icon https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wYbpriUDY6o/WB0Qnn1WgrI/AAAAAAAA_nA/2sICL02wWWEPfm-ahyZtFDDrvsbPp87-wCLcB/s1600/profileIcon1422.jpg And I have no Idea how to obtain it, or if it is even obtainable anymore. And  have not received the new client icon. I NEED MY ICONS

replies.body:
The All-Star Icon was awarded for locking in your [All-Star choices](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/all-star-voting-coming) for this season. The Alpha Client tester icons are still being sent out, so sit tight for that one. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
